title: Launcher Icon
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is located on the device home screen
custom_steps: When the user looks at the launcher icon
custom_expected: Then they see a batter image, red on the left and and blue on the right, three stars on the red side and one star on the blue side, and the MiLB logo below the batter image

title: Text Below Launcher Icon
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is located on the device home screen
custom_steps: When the user views the text below launcher image
custom_expected: Then the user verifies the text is clear and states 'First Pitch'

title: Tapping on Launcher Icon
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is located on the device home screen
custom_steps: When the user taps on the launcher icon
custom_expected: Then the user will view the splash screen

title: Splash Screen
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is located on the device home screen
custom_steps: When the user views the splash screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:
First Pitch text over MiLB.com text, superimposed over a baseball image

title: Teams
custom_steps: When the user taps the Team button from the slide out menu
custom_expected: Then the teams will appear with the favorites on top and the remaining teams in alphabetical order

title: Triple-A & Double-A should appear with hyphen
custom_steps: When the user navigates within the app
custom_expected: Then the user will verity that Triple-A & Double-A should appear with hyphen everywhere in app

title: Current Year Date Support
custom_preconds: Given the current year's Opening Day release is out on the scoreboard, calendar, schedule... and any other date UI
custom_steps: When the user attempts to navigate the dates within the same calendar year (i.e 2018), check the following pages: Club Schedules, Leagues Scoreboard, and Standings
custom_expected:
The user will only be able to navigate the dates from April to September of the same calendar year (i.e. 2018)

NOTE: Standings is a webview, so it should switch automatically to the current year (2018) once the season is considered "started" in the database

title: Class Dates for 2018
custom_preconds: Given the current year's Opening Day release is out on the scoreboard, calendar, schedule... and any other date UI
custom_steps: When the user views the following pages: Club Schedules, Leagues Scoreboard, and Standings
custom_expected: Then the user will view the following start / end dates for the current year

title: Not Able to Navigate to Previous Year
custom_preconds: Given the current year's Opening Day release is out on the scoreboard, calendar, schedule... and any other date UI
custom_steps: When the user attempt to navigate back to the previous year
custom_expected: Then the user will not be able to navigate back to the previous year

title: Team IDs
custom_steps:
When the user views the following teams and it's team IDs:
- Columbia Fireflies (replace Savannah Sand Gnats); t3705
- Hartford Yard Goats (replace New Britain Rock Cats); t538 (team ID is unchanged)
custom_expected:
Then the user will verify the new team name and corresponding team ID:
- Columbia Fireflies (replace Savannah Sand Gnats); t3705
- Hartford Yard Goats (replace New Britain Rock Cats); t538 (team ID is unchanged)

custom_expected: Then the user shall verify the updated team logos appear (new logos found on this ticket - https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/MIAN-330)

title: Watermark Logo
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the app
custom_steps: When the user views the new watermark logo for the DET Tigers everywhere on the app (i.e. team page, team picker, scoreboard, gameday, setting's push notifications, etc.)
custom_expected:
Then the new watermark logo shall be consistent throughout the app

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13053)

title: Team Affiliations File Update
custom_preconds:
Given iOS is updating the MiLB Teams XML to modify some teams' affiliations. So we would have to copy changes over to AWS.

http://wapc.mlb.com/mvc/template/apps/milb/shared/MiLBTeams.xml
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the file for the team affiliations in Charles Proxy
custom_expected:
THEN verify Android is pointing here

QA: http://qa-appconfig.milb.com/android/x.x.x/MiLBTeams.xml
PROD: http://appconfig.milb.com/android/x.x.x/MiLBTeams.xml

(where x.x.x in the links above is the latest version, i.e. 3.2.1)

title: No Language Support
custom_steps: WHEN the user changes the device's language (i.e. Spanish)
custom_expected: THEN the app does not have language support
